name: AirSlug
description:
AirSlug is retro kind simple shooter game. This is a premature release. 

You can control with keyboard and gamepad.

Space : Fire

Esc : Exit to menu

  • Game and Development : TurboG www.turbog.com
  • Planes sprites: jh2assets    jimhatama.itch.io
  • Sounds: Music - Estrayk (Thank you for your permission)
  • Fonts: Bebas Neue by Dharma Type 

Thank you to all content provider artists on itch.io.
